thread.section_title: iMazing Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von iMazing | imazing.com
thread.title: Barbara J. Major
thread.title_full: iMazing bewertet von Barbara J. Major

author: Barbara J. Major
title: Barbara J. Major
text: I have been using iMazing for a while now, version 1. Yesterday I updated to version 2. The software works as promised and has many nice features about it. In purchasing the software, I wasn't given the discount for upgrading from a previous version, so I contacted their support team via the web - and within 24 hours was refunded the amount that should have been discounted. Very happy, very pleased, heartily recommend this software to all who are looking for a utility like this!
